episodes.title: Surf, S*x Cults & Psychedelia - Sky Saxon's Dark Odyssey | Rock 'N' Roll Mysteries #41
episodes.description:
Sky Saxon dropped off the map before the map even got to know him. But the truth about The Seeds' frontman's 1970s life is truly astounding. 

The Source Family Documentary (affiliate) https://amzn.to/4hIJbGe

Well, it's time to kick back, relax and get deep into another strange and mysterious musical life in this full-length music documentary. 

PATREON - I have a Patreon page up and running now, and if you sign up to the $5 'Club Singer' tier, you get an exclusive weekly mini-episode on some marvellous aspect of rock music history, every Thursday! A one-month free trial is available, so why not have a look and see what you think https://www.patreon.com/c/rocknrollmysteries

MEMBER'S AREA - Alternatively, have a look at the Member's Area here by joining the channel. There are a few fun perks for those who do, including badges that appear by your name when you make a comment - and the badges evolve over time to a different music legend!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJTtfcqV9I9b1xVOXFk4vYQ/join

MERCH - There's also Rock 'N' Roll Mysteries merch - Check out the full range with stars like Gram Parsons, Marianne Faithfull and Gene Vincent are already available, and new designs coming soon! Every shirt is 100% exclusive and designed in-house, and shipped by the fantastic folks at Fourthwall. Really great quality shirts too.
https://rock-n-roll-mysteries-shop.fourthwall.com/

HOLLYWOOD MYSTERIES - And of course, don't forget to subscribe to the sister channels, Hollywood Mysteries https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJVuHlMvZG7AJ00e5KgB8qg

AND

SOCIETY MYSTERIES 
https://youtube.com/@societymysteries

Stay tuned for more Rock 'N' Roll!
